text: Ioannis Grivas (; 23 February 1923 - 27 November 2016) was a Greek judge and politician. Grivas was the 87th Prime Minister of Greece. He served as a non- party interim Prime Minister.National Unity Gov't takes office in Greece Grivas was born in Kato Tithorea, Tithorea, Phthiotis in the region of Lokris. He studied at the University of Athens. Grivas died on 27 November 2016 in Athens, aged 93. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Eastern Orthodox Christians Category:Greek judges Category:Prime ministers of Greece
title: Ioannis Grivas
